overview: Every story in this digital download is inspired by a confession submitted to Erika Lust's site XConfessions.com, where anonymous members of the public submit their wildest and most personal sexual fantasies. Included: Mud Dance; Sex Work is Work Parts 1 & 2; Frostbite; Tinder Taxi; Pirate Jenny Strikes Again!
tagline: 6 Films, 7 Directors. The 13th Volume in the XC series is powerfully erotic and flawlessly beautiful.
title: XConfessions 13
